Become a Sponsor

Become a Sponsor.Rmd

We’re thrilled that you’re visiting our Sponsors page! Sponsors like you can benefit from our Competition’s success in many ways:

  • Donating funds: We add donations to our overall cash prize awards which, of course, is a major motivator for attracting top performing traders to the Competition. Therefore when you donate to us, you realize direct, tangible returns by choosing to interview our traders for positions at your firm.
  • Interviewing our traders: We’d love for you to agree to offer job interview top performers for finance positions. Doing so will certainly drive interest in the Competition, and you might very well find a diamond in the rough that you otherwise would miss!
  • Participating in our YouTube shows: We’ll recording 15-20 minute video chats with our sponsors this year on Comp & Coin, the Competition’s companion YouTube channel. You can shoot one of these segments with us and use it to advertise job openings, new products / initiatives, or simply show up and discuss markets.
  • Participating in our Discord server: Partner & Magnate level sponsors will have the option to access our Discord server and interact with the student traders directly – something we certainly encourage!

Please fill out the form below and Zoe or Jake will reach out to you at the email you provided to discuss our collaboration!

Thank you!!!!

Benefits

We offer four levels of sponsorship, which receive benefits as described below:

“Analyst” Tier ($2K -$5k):

  • Logo featured on the Trading Competition’s website as a link to your company’s main website
  • Company shoutout at the end of weekly Competition update videos (Listed in our “thank you to our sponsors”)

“Managing Director” Tier ($5k -$10k):

  • Logo featured on the Trading Competition’s website as a link to your company’s main website
  • Company shoutout at the end of weekly Competition update videos (Listed in our “thank you to our sponsors”)
  • Your company’s spokesperson (or several) appear as guests on “Comp & Coin”, the Competition’s companion YouTube series

“Partner” Tier ($10K -$25k):

  • Logo featured on the Trading Competition’s website as a link to your company’s main website
  • Company shoutout at the end of weekly Competition update videos (Listed in our “thank you to our sponsors”)
  • Your company’s spokesperson (or several) appear as guests on “Comp & Coin”, the Competition’s companion YouTube series
  • 1 registration at TechConnect recruiting event
  • 1 parking pass
  • Access to trader resumes
  • Access to Recruiters channels on the Trading Competition’s Discord server

“Magnate” Tier ($25K+):

  • Logo featured on the Trading Competition’s website as a link to your company’s main website
  • Company shoutout at the end of weekly Competition update videos (Listed in our “thank you to our sponsors”)
  • Your company’s spokesperson (or several) appear as guests on “Comp & Coin”, the Competition’s companion YouTube series
  • 1 registration at TechConnect recruiting event
  • 2 parking pass
  • Access to trader resumes
  • Unfettered access to the Trading Competition’s Discord server, which you can use to interact with our traders (including voice chat)
  • Meeting with Prof. Jimmie Lenz (Director of the FinTech Program) and Duke FinTech Program faculty and staff
  • Access to trade-level data & financials of our student traders.
Fill out my online form.
